item.title: How to Disable IPv6 Permanenetly in Linux
item.description: In this blog I will show you, how you can enable or disable IPv6 in Linux.

item.title: How to Formart a USB Stick From Terminal
item.description: At first you need to identify the drive name, you can do so as follows Deleting the partitions In the terminal type in df which shows the list of Drives and it’s partitions. Choose the correct drive, in my case it is the /dev/sda drive. Now we would use the fdisk terminal utility for modifications in the drive, and type in sudo fdisk /dev/sda which lets you in a interactive session, where you can perform certain operations on the selected drive, like addition, deletion, renaming of a partition.
